skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video captures a dramatic nighttime lightning storm over a vast canyon. Flashes of lightning illuminate the dark, swirling storm clouds, the canyon's rugged terrain, and what appears to be a heavy downpour. The powerful electrical display is set against a backdrop of a star-filled night sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video captures a dramatic nighttime lightning storm over a vast canyon. Flashes of lightning illuminate the dark, swirling storm clouds, the canyon's rugged terrain, and what appears to be a heavy downpour. The powerful electrical display is set against a backdrop of a star-filled night sky.
